code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[FinTech_LedgerService]
        L[FinTech_LedgerService]
        V[FinTech_AuthVault]
        H[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        T[FinTech_AuthVault]
        R[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[FinTech_FraudDetection]

    subgraph Metrics[FinTech_LedgerService]
        MS[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        MF[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        MR[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        MP[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[FinTech_LedgerService]
        C[FinTech_AuthVault] -->|reuse| RU[FinTech_AuthVault]
        C -->|clean| NI[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[FinTech_FraudDetection] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
